instruction: வீட்டு ஓனர் நம்மள திட்டுறாரு, என்னா பண்றது?
output: திட்டுறது harassment-தான். Recording பண்ணி வச்சுக்கோங்க (legal in TN). Police complaint போடலாம் - IPC 504 (intentional insult). Women/SC/ST-க்கு additional protection laws இருக்கு. Advocate-கிட்ட consult பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: 'UAE எக்ஸ்சேஞ்ச் லாட்டரி - நீங்கள் $1 மில்லியன் வென்றீர்கள்' என்று ஈமெயில் வந்தது. நம்பலாமா?
output: இது international lottery scam. நீங்கள் வாங்காத டிக்கெட்டுக்கு பரிசு கிடைக்காது. பாஸ்போர்ட் அல்லது வங்கி தகவல் கொடுக்காதீர்கள்.

instruction: Advance thirumba thara ethanai naal time irukku?
output: Sattapadi veedu kaali seydha 30 days-kkul advance thirumba thara venum. Delay aanaal 6% interest-udan thara venum. Idhu 2017 Act-la clearly mention aagiyirukku.

instruction: e-NAM என்றால் என்ன? எப்படி பயனடைவது?
output: Electronic National Agriculture Market. Online trading platform - இந்தியா முழுவதும் விற்கலாம். Benefit: நல்ல விலை கிடைக்கும், middlemen குறையும், transparent bidding. Register: enam.gov.in, அருகிலுள்ள e-NAM mandi. Process: Produce → Quality testing → Online auction → Highest bidder wins → Payment to bank. TN-ல்: UZHAVAR SANDHAIS connected. Quality Parameters: Moisture, foreign matter, damaged grains-க்கு grade.

instruction: 'Tirupati TTD la irundhu pesuren ayya, special Hundi donation ku select aairukkeenga, 5000 contribution pannina VIP darshan + prasadam' nu call vandhudhu.
output: TTD random calls panni donation kekaadhu ayya. 'VIP darshan for donation' official scheme illa. Phone donation scam - money pogum, darshan varaadhu. ttdevasthanams.ap.gov.in - official website only. Phone calls ignore pannunga.

instruction: Consumer case evvalavu naal aagum?
output: Sattapadi 3-5 months-la mudiikkanum. Aanaal practical-aa 6 months - 2 years aagalam. Simple cases faster. Mediation option irundhaal 30-60 days-la settle aagalam. e-Filing cases faster-aa process aagum.

instruction: Income Certificate எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, self-declaration of income, salary slip (if employed). VAO enquiry at home possible. Time: 7-15 days. Fee: ₹20. Valid for 6 months to 1 year.

instruction: Right to be forgotten என்றால் என்ன?
output: Online-ல் உள்ள personal information delete செய்ய request பண்ணும் right. DPDP Act 2023-ல் provision உண்டு. Google search results remove: Google legal removal request. Social media: Platform privacy settings. Court orders மூலமும் removal possible.

instruction: Bank account-ல காசு போச்சு, யாரோ OTP வாங்கி எடுத்துட்டாங்க
output: உடனே: 1) Bank-க்கு call - 24/7 helpline, account freeze கேளுங்க, 2) 1930 helpline call, 3) Net banking-ல் transactions block, 4) ATM card block. 3 days-க்குள் report பண்ணா liability குறையும். Debit card insurance check பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Expired product vitraal enna complaint seyyalam?
output: FSSAI complaint: fssai.gov.in or Food Safety Officer (District)-kku. Consumer forum-la compensation case. Police complaint (IPC 273 - selling adulterated food). Seller-kku fine + license cancellation aagalam. Product, bill vaichirunga.

instruction: MGNREGA endraal enna? Velai eppadi peruvadhu?
output: 100-day work guarantee for rural families. Eligibility: Rural household, above 18 years, ready for manual labor. Job Card: Apply at Gram Panchayat, get card in 15 days. Wage: ₹294/day in TN (varies by state). Works: Water conservation, roads, agriculture, tree planting. If no work in 15 days: Unemployment allowance. Wages: To bank account within 15 days.

instruction: Pen students-ku enna special schemes irukku?
output:
**Girl Students Special Schemes:**

**1. CM Girl Child Protection:** ₹50,000 FD at birth, ₹1.5L+ at 18

**2. Free Education:** Up to PG in Govt institutions

**3. Moovalur Ramamirtham:** ₹1,000/month for UG girls

**4. Free Bicycle:** Class 11-12 girls

**5. CBSE Udaan:** Free engineering prep for girls

**6. Pragati (AICTE):** ₹50,000/year for tech education

**7. Begum Hazrat Mahal:** Minority girls - ₹5,000-12,000

**8. Free Bus Travel:** All women free in ordinary buses

**Apply:** tneservices.tn.gov.in or through school/college

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'Police welfare fund contribution audit. Pay 2000 to clear discrepancy.' Welfare fund la issue irukka?
output: Police welfare contributions deducted at source from salary. No separate payments for 'audit clearance'. Such calls are scams targeting police personnel. Check with your station accounts or district welfare office for any actual issues.

instruction: 'Instant loan 5 minutes-ல் approval, no documents needed' என்று app install செய்ய சொல்கிறார்கள். Safe-ஆ?
output: Unknown loan apps மிகவும் dangerous. High interest, harassment, photos misuse செய்வார்கள். RBI registered NBFC apps மட்டுமே பயன்படுத்துங்கள்.

instruction: Golden hour endraal enna? Adhula hospital poganumaa?
output: Golden hour = First 60 minutes after trauma/heart attack. Critical because: 1) Brain damage starts in minutes without oxygen, 2) Bleeding control crucial, 3) Heart attack - early treatment = more heart saved, 4) Trauma - internal bleeding stops. Action: 1) Call 108 immediately, 2) Don't move spine injury victims, 3) CPR if no pulse (if trained), 4) Control visible bleeding. Nearest hospital first - don't travel far.

instruction: திருவள்ளுவர் தினம் எப்போது கொண்டாடப்படுகிறது?
output: தை மாதம் 2-ம் தேதி (ஜனவரி 15 அல்லது 16). பொங்கலுக்கு அடுத்த நாள். Tamil Nadu-வில் government holiday. Schools-ல் Thirukkural competitions நடக்கும்.

instruction: 'NEET answer key - 100% correct! Pay 5000 for early access' - Telegram channel offer. Buy பண்ணலாமா?
output: Scam! Official answer key NTA release பண்ணும் free-ஆ. 'Early access' என்று ஏமாத்துறாங்க. Exam result time-ல anxiety exploit பண்றாங்க. Official websites மட்டும் trust பண்ணுங்க. Paid answer keys எல்லாம் fraud.

instruction: QR code scan panna panam poachu (reverse scam). Special recovery procedure irukka?
output: Why tricky: YOU authorized transaction (entered PIN), bank sees as 'legitimate'. But still possible: Step 1 (within 30 min): Call bank - 'Fraudulently induced to make payment', request beneficiary bank freeze. Step 2: Contact beneficiary bank from UPI ID (@oksbi = SBI, @okicici = ICICI). Step 3: FIR - Section 420 IPC (Cheating by inducement), Section 66D IT Act. Step 4: Collect QR code image, chat where asked to scan. Legal argument: 'Consent obtained by fraud is no consent'. Recovery: 20-30% if reported within 1 hour.

instruction: Blood transfusion-la wrong blood koduthaanga - action enna?
output: Serious negligence! Life-threatening error. Blood bank + hospital liable. Action: 1) Medical records + blood bank records collect, 2) Consumer Forum, 3) Criminal case if death/serious injury, 4) Blood bank license complaint (State Blood Transfusion Council). Protocols violated: Blood matching, cross-matching, identification. Compensation: High - can be fatal mistake.

instruction: Lok Adalat என்றால் என்ன?
output: Alternative dispute resolution forum - Court fee இல்லை, compromise மூலம் settlement. Motor accident claims, labour disputes, matrimonial (except divorce), cheque bounce, compoundable offences - இவற்றை handle செய்வார்கள். Award final - appeal இல்லை.

instruction: Email vandhuchu 'Your Jira license expiring, IT head approved renewal. Click to pay 50,000 from company account.' IT head name mention pannirukkanga, process pannalama?
output: Business Email Compromise (BEC) attack! Scammers research company structure, impersonate executives. Real renewals go through procurement, not random emails. Verify with IT head directly through phone/internal chat. Never pay based on email alone.

instruction: தமிழ்நாட்டில் BBA/BCA சேர்க்கை எப்படி நடக்கிறது?
output: +2 ஏதேனும் group pass. அரசு கல்லூரிகளுக்கு: TNGASA counselling மூலம். தனியார் கல்லூரிகள்: நேரடி விண்ணப்பம். BBA - Business படிப்பு, BCA - Computer படிப்பு. படிப்பு காலம்: 3 ஆண்டுகள். அரசு கல்லூரி கட்டணம்: ₹3,000-8,000/ஆண்டு. Anna University affiliated colleges பல உள்ளன.

instruction: Ration card complaint enge koduppadhu?
output: Options: 1) Ration shop-la complaint book, 2) Taluk Supply Officer, 3) District Supply Officer, 4) Food helpline: 1967, 5) TNCSC website. Issues: Fake entries, quantity shortage, quality issues, dealer misbehavior. Aadhaar seeding problems: UIDAI + DSO.

instruction: Nalla arasanin / leader-oda gunangal enna endru Valluvar solkiraar?
output: Kural: 'Muraiseidhu kaappaatrum mannavan makkadku iraiyendru vaikkap padum'. Neeyaamaaga nadandhu, makkalai kaappaatrum arasan kadavulukkku samam. Melum: 'Kodaiyali sengol kudiyombal naangum udaiyaanaam vendharkku oli'. Kodai, arul, needhi, makkal nalam - indha naangum ulla leader sirandhavar.

instruction: TN Mid-Day Meal Scheme endraal enna?
output: Free nutritious lunch for Govt school students. Coverage: Class 1-10 (Govt + Aided schools). Menu: Rice/Variety rice + Sambar + Egg/Banana + Boiled Egg (weekly). Morning: Nutrition breakfast (select areas). Nutrition: 450-700 calories, 12-20g protein. Aim: Increase school attendance, Nutrition, Prevent dropouts. Quality: Monthly inspection, Nutritionist supervision. Anganwadi: Integrated Child Development Services for 0-6 years kids.

instruction: Thiruvalluvar siddharaaga karudhapadugiraaraa?
output: Thiruvalluvar Siddhargaloda pattiyalil silaraal serkkapadugirar. Gnaani endra vagayil Siddhar pondra status. Aanaal Thirukkural maruththuvam, rasavaadham pondra Siddhar subjects patri pesavillai - ethics, morality, worldly wisdom patri pesugiradhu. Enavae 'Gnaani' endru solvathu more appropriate. Siddhargaloda spiritual depth, Thiruvalluvaroda practical wisdom - irandaum complementary. Tamil gnnaanathoda iru mugangal!

instruction: என்கம்பிரன்ஸ் சான்று (EC) எங்கே பெறுவது?
output: ஆன்லைன்: tnreginet.gov.in (1987 முதல் கிடைக்கும்). நேரடி: சார்பதிவாளர் அலுவலகம். கட்டணம்: ஒவ்வொரு வருடத்திற்கும் ₹15. காலம்: ஆன்லைனில் உடனடி, நேரடியாக 3-5 நாட்கள்.

instruction: ESI card benefits என்னென்ன?
output: Benefits: 1) Free medical care (ESI hospitals/dispensaries), 2) Sickness benefit (70% wages), 3) Maternity benefit (100% wages - 26 weeks), 4) Disability benefit, 5) Dependent benefit (death case), 6) Funeral expenses. Salary Rs.21,000/month வரை ESI applicable.

instruction: கோலம் (Kolam) என்ன? எப்படி போடுவது?
output: கோலம் - வீட்டு வாசலில் போடும் floor design. Rice flour (அரிசி மாவு) பயன்படுத்துவது traditional - ants, birds-க்கு உணவு. வகைகள்: 1) புள்ளி கோலம் - dots around design, 2) சிக்கு கோலம் - intricate patterns, 3) நேர் கோலம் - straight lines. Every day different design. பொங்கல் - special big கோலம். Aadi month - கல் பூக்கள் (stone flowers) add பண்றாங்க. YouTube-ல் tutorials நிறைய. Tamil women's daily art form!

instruction: Panam semikka mudiyavillai - enna kural udhavum?
output: 'Alavarinndhu vaazhaadhaan vaazhkkai ulapola illaagiththondraak kedum'. Varavukku thagundabadi selavu seiyaadhavan vaazhkkai kedum. Melum: 'Aagaaru alavarinndhu eega' - income arinDhu selavaziyungal. Budget maintain pannungal. Needs vs Wants piriyungal. 50-30-20 rule follow pannungal!

instruction: Documents சம்பந்தமான பொதுவான தவறுகள் என்ன?
output:
Birth Certificate:
❌ 21 நாட்களுக்கு பின் பதிவு செய்ய முடியாது
✅ முடியும், ஆனால் late fee + Affidavit தேவை

Marriage Certificate:
❌ இல்லாமல் married status prove செய்ய முடியாது
✅ Wedding photos, invitation, witnesses மூலமும் prove செய்யலாம்

Driving License:
❌ Learning License-க்கு பின் உடனே DL test எழுதலாம்
✅ 30 நாட்கள் காத்திருக்க வேண்டும்

Voter ID:
❌ 18 வயது ஆனவுடன் automatically கிடைக்கும்
✅ Apply செய்ய வேண்டும் (Form 6)

Passport:
❌ Police Verification fail = Passport reject
✅ Re-verification chance, appeal process உள்ளது

EC (Encumbrance Certificate):
❌ EC clear = property சுத்தமானது
✅ EC 1987-க்கு பின் மட்டும், அதற்கு முன் manual check தேவை

instruction: ITI padippu yarukku errathu? Eppadi seruvathu?
output: 8th or 10th pass aanavargalukku. 130+ types of trades irukku (Electrician, Fitter, Welder, Computer Operator etc). Admission: www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in. Duration: 6 months to 2 years. Govt ITI fully free. Padicha approm Apprenticeship seiyalam, nalla job opportunity.

instruction: வாட்ஸ்அப் குழுவில் 'தினமும் 10% வருமானம், 1 லட்சம் முதலீடு செய்யுங்கள், 30 நாளில் 4 லட்சம் பெறுங்கள்' என்று பார்த்தேன். இது சாத்தியமா?
output: இது போன்சி மோசடி திட்டம். தினமும் 10% (ஆண்டுக்கு 3650%) என்பது சாத்தியமற்றது. வங்கி வட்டி 7% மட்டுமே. இது உங்கள் பணத்தைத் திருடும் மோசடி. முதலீடு செய்யாதீர்கள்.

instruction: Merchant Navy join ஆக என்ன படிக்கணும்?
output: Courses: 1) B.Sc Nautical Science (3 years) - Deck Officer 2) Marine Engineering (4 years) - Engine room 3) GP Rating (6 months) - Entry level. Eligibility: 12th PCM 60%+, Medical fitness strict. Institutes: IMU Chennai, AMET Chennai, MERI. Admission: IMU CET entrance exam. Career: High salary (₹50,000 - ₹5 lakh/month with experience), World travel. Challenges: Months away from family.

instruction: Medical negligence-க்கு எவ்வளவு compensation கேட்கலாம்?
output: Claim include: 1) Medical expenses incurred, 2) Future treatment cost, 3) Loss of income, 4) Pain and suffering (mental agony), 5) Loss of life expectancy, 6) Punitive damages. Lakhs to Crores வரை - case severity-ஐ பொறுத்தது. Expert lawyer consult பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: 'SEBI registered advisor, daily 2-3 stocks, 100% profit guaranteed, monthly subscription 10,000' nu call vandhudhu. Side income aagum nu paakkuren.
output: '100% profit guaranteed' - SEBI regulations la illegal claim. Registered advisors ipdi cold calls pannaadhu. Subscription vaangitu random tips kuduppaanga - loss vandha responsibility illa. SEBI registered check pannunga sebi.gov.in la - most callers fake registration claim pannuvaanga.

instruction: Video call screenshot eduthu blackmail pannuraanga. Report panna bayam - video spread aagumaa?
output: Critical understanding: Paying NEVER stops blackmail - increases it. Reporting DOES NOT spread content. Scammers rarely actually share (want money, not revenge). You're VICTIM, not criminal. Immediate: DO NOT PAY, DO NOT ENGAGE, document everything, secure accounts (change passwords, 2FA). Reporting: cybercrime.gov.in → 'Cyber Crime Against Women' (anonymous option), Women Helpline 181/1091, Platform report to remove content. FIR Sections: 384 IPC (Extortion), 506 IPC (Intimidation), 67A IT Act. Support: IT for Change, Cyber Peace Foundation. Your image is YOUR property.

instruction: Thirukkuralil business-kku udhavum kuralgal enna?
output: Porutpaalil business-kku etra adhigaarangal: 1) Ookkamudaimai - motivation, 2) Aalvinai udaimai - leadership, 3) Idanarithtal - market analysis, 4) Kaalamarithal - timing, 5) Vinaiththitpam - focus, 6) Vinaiththooimai - ethics, 7) Therindhu seyalvagai - planning. MBA courses-la Thirukkural teach panraanga ippo!

instruction: Thirukkuraloda mudhal kural edhu?
output: 'Agara mudhala ezhuththellam aadhi bhagavan mudhatre ulagu'. Artham: 'A' ezhutthu ella ezhutthukkkalkkum aadharam pola, iraivan ulagaththirku aadharam.

instruction: Dhanteras - 'Gold coin free with jewellery purchase! WhatsApp to reserve' jeweller offer. Genuine-ஆ?
output: Verify the jeweller! Dhanteras-ல fly-by-night jewellers அதிகம். 'Free gold coin' bait வச்சு low quality sell பண்ணுவாங்க. Known jewellers மட்டும் trust பண்ணுங்க. BIS hallmark check பண்ணுங்க. WhatsApp booking avoid பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: International Driving Permit (IDP) eppadi peruvathu?
output: Apply: RTO office (not online). Documents: Valid Indian DL, passport, visa, photos. Fee: Rs.1,000. Validity: 1 year or Indian DL validity - edhu koraivo adhu. IDP alone not valid - Indian DL-udan carry pannanum.

instruction: பெண் குழந்தைகளுக்கு property right இருக்கா?
output: ஆம். 2005 Hindu Succession Amendment Act படி மகள்களுக்கு மகன்களுக்கு சமமான right உண்டு - ancestral property-லும், self-acquired property-லும். Married/unmarried difference இல்லை. இது retrospective-ஆ apply.

instruction: Court marriage eppadi seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Marriage Registrar office-la form submit (30 days before), 2) Notice board-la display, 3) Objection period (30 days), 4) Marriage ceremony (Registrar mun), 5) Certificate issue. Witnesses: 3 per. Documents: Birth certificate, address proof, photos, affidavit.

instruction: Semester exam-க்கு last minute preparation tips?
output: Last week strategy: 1) Previous year papers - pattern identify 2) Important questions list make 3) Short notes revise, not new topics 4) Formula sheets ready 5) Sleep properly - memory consolidation 6) Light food, hydration 7) Morning revision of previous day 8) Group discussion for doubt clearing 9) Hall ticket, stationery ready. Avoid: All-night study, new topics, junk food, negative people. Trust your preparation!

instruction: Legal adoption எப்படி செய்வது?
output: CARA (Central Adoption Resource Authority) through only - cara.wcd.gov.in. Register → Home study → Child matching → Pre-adoption fostering → Court order. Hindu Adoption Act-ன் கீழ் deed registration-உம் valid. Private adoption risky - legal complications வரலாம்.

instruction: 'ஆக்கம் இழந்தேமென்று' - தோல்வி பற்றிய குறள் என்ன சொல்கிறது?
output: குறள்: 'ஆக்கம் இழந்தேமென்று அல்லாவார் ஊக்கம் ஒருவந்தம் கைத்துடை யார்'. அர்த்தம்: செல்வம் இழந்தாலும் 'இழந்துவிட்டோம்' என்று அழுவார் அல்ல, ஊக்கம் உள்ளவர்கள். Setbacks-க்கு cry பண்றவர்கள் weak. Strong people bounce back. Resilience is wealth!

instruction: Matrimony site la romance scam - report and recovery?
output: BharatMatrimony: Profile → Report → 'Fake/Fraud', support@bharatmatrimony.com, 044-45002300. Shaadi.com: Profile → Report, care@shaadi.com, 022-67448888. Tamil Matrimony: support@tamilmatrimony.com. Tinder/Bumble/Hinge: Profile → Report → 'Scam or Spam'. Important: Collect ALL chat history before reporting, profile screenshots (they'll delete), photos received, money transfer receipts. Police FIR essential for large amounts. Recovery very low (money usually abroad). Prevention better: Video call verify, never send money before meeting.

instruction: Complaint file panna enna documents collect pannanum?
output: Collect BEFORE filing: Screenshots of ALL conversations (WhatsApp, SMS, email), call recordings if available, scammer's phone numbers, scammer's bank account/UPI ID, transaction receipts/screenshots, bank statement showing debit, any links/websites shared, scammer's social media profiles, your Aadhaar/ID proof, your bank account details, timeline of events written down. Storage tip: Email screenshots to yourself (timestamp proof), Google Drive backup, don't delete anything from phone.

instruction: PAN Card pattriya common thavarugal enna?
output:
Wrong Beliefs vs Truth:

1. ❌ Cannot open Bank Account without PAN → ✅ PAN mandatory only for ₹50,000+ transactions
2. ❌ Minor doesn't need PAN → ✅ Required in some cases (Investment, Income)
3. ❌ PAN-Aadhaar link is optional → ✅ Mandatory, else PAN becomes inoperative
4. ❌ Having two PANs is okay → ✅ Illegal, ₹10,000 fine
5. ❌ PAN card needs renewal → ✅ Lifetime valid, no renewal needed
6. ❌ PAN number changes → ✅ Lifetime same number
7. ❌ e-PAN is not valid → ✅ e-PAN is legally valid

Common Mistakes:
- Wrong DOB in PAN → Aadhaar mismatch
- Father's name instead of Husband's name
- Not linking despite ₹1,000 late fee

instruction: கடைக்காரன் மோசமான சாமான் குடுத்துட்டான், என்ன பண்றது?
output: Bill இருக்கா பாருங்க. Bill இருந்தா exchange/refund கேளுங்க. Refuse பண்ணா Consumer helpline-ல call பண்ணுங்க - 1800-11-4000. WhatsApp-ல complaint: 8800001915. Simple-ஆ solve ஆகும்.

instruction: RC transfer eppadi seivathu?
output: Vehicle sale-kkup piragu: 1) Form 29, 30 fill, 2) Both buyer & seller sign, 3) NOC from financer (if loan), 4) Insurance transfer, 5) RTO submit + fee pay. Time: 30 days-kkul. Delay: Fine + legal issues. Online: parivahan.gov.in partially available.

instruction: Advance directive for mental health endraal enna?
output: Advance directive = When mentally well, write down treatment preferences for future crisis. Includes: 1) Preferred treatment methods, 2) Treatments to avoid, 3) Nominated representative, 4) Hospital preferences, 5) ECT consent/refusal. How: Register with Mental Health Review Board. Benefits: Your wishes respected even when unable to communicate. Can modify when competent. Legal document.

instruction: Sleeping pills vaanga prescription venumaa?
output: Yes! Most sleeping pills = Schedule H1/X - strict prescription control. Schedule H1: Alprazolam, Clonazepam, etc. - prescription + ID proof + register entry. Schedule X: Stronger sedatives - even stricter. Why: Addiction potential, misuse risk, suicide risk. Alternative: Melatonin (less restricted), lifestyle changes. Doctor: Will evaluate sleep issue cause first.

instruction: விதை வாங்க subsidy கிடைக்குமா?
output: Certified seeds-க்கு 50% subsidy உண்டு. Agriculture department depot-ல் subsidized rate-ல் விதை வாங்கலாம். Paddy, millets, pulses-க்கு subsidy available.

instruction: Adakkam (humility) patri enna kuralgal ullana?
output: Kural: 'Adakkam amararul uykkum adangaamai aaarirul uyththu vidum'. Adakkam sorgaththukkku kondu sellum, adangaamai naragaththukkku. Melum: 'Kaakka porulaa adakkaththai aakkam adhaninnooung killai uyirkku'. Adakkaththai uyiraip pol kaappaatrungal. Humility = gateway to success!

instruction: புதிய ரேஷன் அட்டை எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: Apply at tnpds.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: All family members' Aadhaar, address proof, income certificate, gas connection details, photos. Types: PHH (₹1 rice), AAY (free rice), NPHH. RI inspection, 30-45 days processing.

instruction: Online-la fraud aayitten, police-kku ponaa ozhungaa case poduvaangalaa? (Chennai style)
output: Cyber crime special cell irukku - trained officers. cybercrime.gov.in-la first complaint podunga - track aagum. Local police-kkum FIR podunga. Both simultaneously pannalam. Evidence (screenshots, bank statements) ready-aa vachukonga.

instruction: Petrorkaludan misunderstanding irundhaal enna seivadhu?
output: 'Annaiyum pithavum munnari deivam' (Kondraivendhan). Petrorae mudhal kadavul. Melum: 'Eendra pozhudhin peridhuvakkum thanmagaNai saandron enakketta thaay'. Thaay thandhai nam nalladharkae solkirargal. Patience-udan explain pannungal, respect maintain pannungal.

instruction: Farmer family students-ku special scholarship ulladha?
output: Agriculture family scholarships: 1) IFFCO Scholarship - ₹25,000/year 2) Kotak Kisan - ₹10,000-30,000 3) TNAU free education for farmers' children 4) Agriculture Department scholarships. Eligibility: Farmer certificate from VAO, small/marginal farmer category. Priority in agriculture courses. Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) free training available. Apply through Agriculture office or online portals.

instruction: Lock-out period-ல் rent கட்டணுமா?
output: Lock-in period (not lock-out): Agreement-ல் specify பண்ணிருக்கும். During lock-in: 1) Tenant vacate பண்ணினால் - remaining months rent pay பண்ணணும், 2) Owner evict பண்ண முடியாது. After lock-in: Normal notice period applies (usually 1-2 months). Negotiate: Lock-in waiver possible with mutual consent. Always read agreement before signing!

instruction: Makkal nalam / public welfare patri enna kuralgal ullana?
output: Kural: 'Kudipuram kaakkum oruvanai makkal adipuram kaapparul vaippar'. Makkalai kaappaatrrum arasanai makkal madhippaargal. Melum: 'Iraikkaakkum vaiyagam ellam avanai muraikkaakkum muttach seyin'. Arasan neeyaamaaga aandaal, ulagamae avanai kaakkum. Leader who serves people = people protect leader. Public service = ultimate duty!

instruction: உண்மையா பொய்யா: Myth: Government school-ல் படிச்சா success ஆக முடியாது
output: உண்மை: Fact: பல IAS officers, Doctors, Engineers government school products. 7.5% reservation போன பிறகு government school NEET toppers அதிகரித்துள்ளனர். Quality of education depends on student's effort + teacher dedication. Many district toppers from government schools. Free education + scholarships = excellent opportunity.

instruction: Small business owner-க்கு call - 'MSME loan sanction ஆனது, disbursement-க்கு GST registration fee முன்கூட்டியே கட்டுங்கள்'.

instruction: 'Premium Spotify/Netflix free - Download APK from [link]' nu Telegram la share aachhu. Official app paid, idhu free alternative aa?
output: Pirated APKs malware contain pannum - banking trojans, keyloggers. 'Free premium' bait. Phone data full aa steal aagum. Legitimate apps - Play Store/App Store only. Piracy shortcuts la malware risk always irukku.

instruction: Tirupati darshan ku donation pannunga nu call vandhuchchi ayyaa. TTD la irundhu nu sonnanga ayyaa.

instruction: Naturopathy endraal enna? Ayurveda-vida verupaadu?
output: Naturopathy = Treatment using nature's elements. Methods: Water (hydrotherapy), mud, air, sun, diet, fasting, yoga. Difference from Ayurveda: 1) No medicines (mostly), 2) Focus on lifestyle correction, 3) More recent system, 4) Emphasizes fasting/detox. Combined: Often practiced with Yoga. Qualification: BNYS (Bachelor of Naturopathy and Yogic Sciences). Good for: Lifestyle diseases, prevention, detoxification.

instruction: Email vandhudhu - 'Congratulations! Selected for XYZ Scholarship 50,000, processing fee 2000 required.'
output: Legitimate scholarships processing fee kekaadhu. 'Selected' without application - impossible. Email links phishing sites. NSP (National Scholarship Portal), university official scholarships apply pannunga - all free process.

instruction: ATM receipt-ல் 'account balance check செய்ய missed call கொடுங்கள்' என்று sticker பார்த்தேன். செய்யலாமா?
output: செய்யாதீர்கள். ATM-ல் போடப்படும் sticker-கள் scam. Missed call கொடுத்தால் உங்கள் நம்பர் scammer-க்கு போகும். வங்கியின் official number-ஐ மட்டுமே பயன்படுத்துங்கள்.

instruction: Aandaal yaar? Thiruppaavai endraal enna?
output: Aandaal - 12 Azhvaargalil ore penn. Srivilliputhooril Periyaazhvaaraal valarkkappattavar. Ranganatharai (Srirangam) kanavaragaa karudhi, avaraiye manandhaar endru nambappadugiradhu. Thiruppaavai - 30 paasurangal, Margazhi maadhaththil paadappduvathu. 'Margazhith thingal madhiniraindha nannaalaal' endru thodangum. Kovilgal, veedugalil Margazhiyil dhinamum oru paasuram paaduvathu tradition. Naachiyar Thirumozhi matroru padaippu.

instruction: Abortion refuse panraanga (unmarried) - rights?
output: Illegal to refuse! MTP Act 2021: Explicitly includes unmarried women. If refused: 1) Ask for written reason, 2) Escalate to hospital administration, 3) Complaint to DHS, 4) Court (urgent petition). Marital status: Not relevant for abortion right. Judgment questions: Doctor should not morally judge. Alternative: Find another approved centre. Time sensitive: Don't delay - gestational limits apply.

instruction: Doctor-mela criminal case podalaamaa?
output: Yes, for: 1) Death due to negligence (Section 304A IPC / Section 106 BNS), 2) Grievous hurt (Section 338 IPC), 3) Hurt (Section 337 IPC). Punishment: 304A - 2 years imprisonment + fine. Requirement: Gross negligence, not just error. Supreme Court: Doctors shouldn't be arrested for bona fide errors. But criminal recklessness = liable. FIR: Police can register on complaint.

instruction: Abortion refuse பண்றாங்க (unmarried) - rights?
output: Illegal to refuse! MTP Act 2021: Explicitly includes unmarried women. If refused: 1) Ask for written reason, 2) Escalate to hospital administration, 3) Complaint to DHS, 4) Court (urgent petition). Marital status: Not relevant for abortion right. Judgment questions: Doctor should not morally judge. Alternative: Find another approved centre. Time sensitive: Don't delay - gestational limits apply.

instruction: 'Passport office - உங்கள் passport revoke ஆகிவிட்டது, appeal செய்ய fee கட்டுங்கள்' என்று call வந்தது.
output: Passport office phone-ல் fee கேட்காது. Passport status online-ல் check செய்யுங்கள். Official passport seva website மட்டுமே நம்பகமானது.

instruction: Animation/VFX padippu career-ku nalladha?
output: Growing industry! Courses: 1) B.Sc Animation 2) Diploma (Arena, MAAC, Frameboxx) 3) Certificate courses. Duration: 6 months - 3 years. Skills: Maya, 3ds Max, After Effects, Photoshop. Jobs: Animation studios, Game companies, Ad agencies, Film industry (VFX). Chennai: Major hub for animation studios. Salary: ₹15,000-40,000 starting. Freelancing possible. Portfolio = key to jobs.

instruction: US job search panren. 'H1B sponsorship guaranteed, employer tie-up ready, processing fee $3000' nu consultancy solrudhu.
output: H1B lottery-based - 'guaranteed' impossible. Legitimate employers employee fee pay pannuvaanga, candidate kekaadhu. $3000 vaangitu fake offer letter kuduppaanga - visa reject, money gone. Direct company applications, LinkedIn jobs - legitimate path.

instruction: Pudhiya electricity connection eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Apply at nsc.tnebnet.org with ownership proof (sale deed/rent agreement), Aadhaar, building certificate. Inspection by TANGEDCO. Charges: Deposit ₹500-15,000 based on load. Time: 7-15 days. Agricultural connection: FREE electricity for farming.

instruction: தமிழ்நாட்டில் பாலிடெக்னிக் டிப்ளோமா சேர்க்கை எப்படி?
output: 10th pass-க்கு பிறகு சேரலாம். DOTE (Directorate of Technical Education) கவுன்சிலிங்: 1) www.tndte.gov.in-ல் விண்ணப்பம் 2) 10th மதிப்பெண் அடிப்படையில் rank 3) ஆன்லைன் choice filling 4) கல்லூரி ஒதுக்கீடு. படிப்பு காலம்: 3 ஆண்டுகள். அரசு கல்லூரி கட்டணம்: ₹1,500-3,000/ஆண்டு. Lateral entry to engineering 2nd year possible.

instruction: மாற்றுத்திறனாளிகளுக்கான ஓய்வூதியம் எவ்வளவு?
output: 40% மேல் disability இருந்தால் மாதம் Rs.1,500 கிடைக்கும். Disability certificate (medical board certified), Aadhaar, income certificate தேவை. 18 வயது முதல் எந்த வயதிலும் apply செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Retrenchment compensation எவ்வளவு கிடைக்கும்?
output: Formula: 15 days average pay × years of service. Applicable: 100+ employees company, 1 year+ service. Notice: 3 months advance or 3 months pay. LIFO principle (Last In First Out) follow ஆகணும். Re-employment preference உண்டு.

instruction: Legal notice எப்படி அனுப்புவது? Lawyer வேணுமா?
output: Self அனுப்பலாம், but lawyer recommended for proper drafting. Format: 1) From/To addresses, 2) Subject, 3) Facts, 4) Legal grounds, 5) Demand/relief sought, 6) Time limit (usually 15-30 days), 7) Consequence warning. Send: Registered post AD (Acknowledgement Due). Keep copy + postal receipt. Reply not mandatory but advisable.

instruction: Anticipatory bail endraal enna?
output: Arrest aavadharku munnaalaye bail peruvathu. Non-bailable offence-kku Sessions Court/High Court-la apply pannalam. FIR padhivana udanaye apply pannalam. Grant aanaal arrest aagaamal investigation-la cooperate seyyalam.

instruction: Data Science, AI courses-க்கு எந்த college best?
output: IIT Madras (BSc in Data Science - online), Anna University, VIT, SRM, PSG Tech ஆகியவற்றில் AI/ML courses உள்ளன. IIT Madras online degree affordable-ஆகவும் flexible-ஆகவும் இருக்கு.

instruction: Avvaiyar yaar? Eththanai Avvaiyargal irundhaargal?
output: Avvaiyar - Tamilin migap pugazh petra penn kavignar. 'Avvai' endraal 'moodhaatti' alladhu 'thaay' endru porul. Pala kaalakattangalil vevveru Avvaiyargal irundhathaaga scholars karudhugirar: 1) Sangam kaala Avvaiyar - Puranaanooru paadiyavar, Athiyamaan Nedunchezhiyanoda nanbar, 2) Bhakthi kaala Avvaiyar - Aathichudi, Kondraivendhan ezhuthiyavar, Murugan bhakthai. Irandaavadhu Avvaiyar migavum popular - kuzhanthaigalukkku needhi karpikkum paadalgal ezhuthiyavar.

instruction: யாரோ என்னைப் பற்றி gossip பண்றாங்க - எப்படி handle பண்றது?
output: 'கண்ணின்று கண்ணறச் சொல்லினும் சொல்லற்க முன்னின்று பின்நோக்காச் சொல்'. முன்னால் நல்லது பேசி, பின்னால் கெட்டது பேசுவதை avoid பண்ணுங்கள். Gossip பண்றவர்கள் own credibility இழப்பார்கள். Ignore them. 'மன்த்துக்கண் மாசிலன் ஆதல்' - உங்கள் மனம் clean-ஆக இருந்தால் போதும். Their words can't hurt you.

instruction: Hospital bill excessive-aa irukku - enna seyyalam?
output: Itemized bill kelunga - hospital thara venum. Rate list display kattaayam (Clinical Establishments Act). Overcharging complaint: 1) State Health Department, 2) District Collector, 3) Consumer forum. Insurance involved-aa irundhaal TPA-kkum complaint podunga.

instruction: NEET-ku prepare aaga enna pannanum-pa? Free coaching irukkuma?
output: NCERT Biology, Physics, Chemistry - line by line read pannu/pannunga. Free coaching: Government centres-la apply pannu through school. Online free: YouTube (Physics Wallah), SWAYAM. 7.5% reservation govt school students-ku. Daily 6-8 hours padikka venum. Previous year papers practice important.

instruction: Payir kadan (Crop Loan) kuraintha vattiyil eppadi vaanguvadhu? KCC endraal enna?

instruction: Doctor enga native language-la explain pannanumaa?
output: Yes! Right to information in understandable language. Includes: 1) Diagnosis explanation, 2) Treatment options, 3) Risks and benefits, 4) Consent form explanation, 5) Medicine instructions. If doctor doesn't speak Tamil: Hospital should arrange translator. Written materials: Should be in local language. Complaint: If communication barrier causes harm - negligence claim possible.

instruction: PAN-Aadhaar Link எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Online: eportal.incometax.gov.in → Link Aadhaar → Enter PAN and Aadhaar → OTP verify → Pay ₹1,000 late fee. SMS method: Send 'UIDPAN <Aadhaar> <PAN>' to 567678. MANDATORY - unlinked PAN becomes inoperative!

instruction: Court marriage எப்படி செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Marriage Registrar office-ல் form submit (30 days before), 2) Notice board-ல் display, 3) Objection period (30 days), 4) Marriage ceremony (Registrar முன்), 5) Certificate issue. Witnesses: 3 பேர். Documents: Birth certificate, address proof, photos, affidavit.

instruction: Siddha maruththuvam endraal enna?
output: Siddha = Tamilnaattin paarambariya maruththuva murai. Origin: 18 Siddhars (gnaniyar) developed. Age: 5,000+ years old. Principle: Udal (body), Uyir (soul), Manam (mind) balance. Based on: Pancha bootham (5 elements), 96 thathuvangal, 3 doshas (Vatham, Pitham, Kabam). Treatment: Diet, herbs, minerals, yoga, lifestyle. Recognition: Government of India recognized AYUSH system.

instruction: Pregnant women-க்கு என்ன free schemes இருக்கு?
output: TN schemes: 1) Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme - Rs.18,000 cash assistance, 2) Free delivery at government hospitals, 3) Free antenatal checkups, 4) Iron/folic acid tablets free, 5) Free ultrasound scans, 6) 102 ambulance for transport, 7) Post-delivery nutrition support. Register: PHC/Government hospital within first trimester. Amma Baby Care Kit: Free baby items.

instruction: Competitive exam preparation-க்கு daily routine எப்படி இருக்க வேண்டும்?
output: Ideal routine: 5:00 AM - எழுந்து, fresh topics படிப்பு (2-3 hrs). 8:00 AM - breakfast, current affairs. 9:00 AM - Practice/mock tests. 12:00 PM - lunch, short rest. 2:00 PM - revision, notes making. 5:00 PM - exercise/break. 6:00 PM - optional subjects. 9:00 PM - light revision, daily news. 10:00 PM - sleep. Weekly: 1 full mock test. Monthly: syllabus completion target வையுங்கள்.

instruction: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY) என்றால் என்ன?
output: Organic Farming ஊக்குவிப்பு திட்டம். Cluster: 50+ விவசாயிகள் சேர்ந்து 50 ஏக்கர். Support: ₹50,000/hectare (3 வருடத்தில்) - Organic inputs, certification, marketing. PGS Certification: Participatory Guarantee System - free organic certification. Benefit: Premium price for organic produce, export opportunity, soil health improvement. Join: Agriculture Department, Krishi Vigyan Kendra. Training: Organic farming techniques, composting, bio-pesticides.

instruction: Diagnosis miss ஆச்சு, cancer late-ஆ detect ஆச்சு - negligence-ஆ?
output: Depends on circumstances. Negligence if: 1) Symptoms clearly pointed to cancer, 2) Standard tests not ordered, 3) Reports misread, 4) Follow-up not done, 5) Patient's complaints ignored. Not negligence if: Symptoms were atypical, tests done but cancer not detectable at that stage. Prove: What a reasonably competent doctor would have done. Expert witness: Essential for such cases.

instruction: Traffic police license vaangittu poyittaar, enna panradhu? (Chennai style)
output: Challan receipt vaangunga - license-kku padhil temporary receipt koduppaanga. Fine pay panni license collect pannunga (traffic police station/court). 60 days-kkul collect pannalnna cancelled aagalam. Online payment-um available.

instruction: 'Vinaikkan vinaiyudaiyaan' - velayoda mukkiyaththuvam patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Vinaikkan vinaiyudaiyaan kenmai veraaga ninaippaanai neengum thiru'. Artham: Velai seiyum bodhu fully focused illaamal, vera vishayangal ninaippavanaai selvam vittu poyvidum. Work-la distraction = failure. Concentration and dedication needed for success.

instruction: தமிழ்நாடு குடிசை மாற்று வாரியத்தில் வீடு எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: TNSCB (Slum Clearance Board) through application செய்யலாம். Slum area-ல் வசிக்கும் குடும்பங்களுக்கு priority. Ration card, Aadhaar, income proof கொடுத்து local office-ல் apply செய்யவும்.

instruction: PhD students-க்கு fellowship எப்படி வாங்குவது?
output: UGC NET JRF, CSIR JRF clear செய்தால் Rs.31,000-37,000 monthly fellowship கிடைக்கும். University-யிலும் PhD fellowship schemes உண்டு. Guide மூலம் apply செய்யவும்.

instruction: Mental illness treatment government hospital-ல் கிடைக்குமா?
output: Yes! Free psychiatric services available. Where: 1) Institute of Mental Health (Kilpauk - Chennai), 2) District Mental Health Program (DMHP) centres, 3) Medical college psychiatry OPD. Services: 1) Consultation, 2) Medicines, 3) Counseling, 4) Admission if needed. DMHP: Every district has mental health team. Helpline: iCALL - 9152987821, Vandrevala - 1860-2662-345. Stigma-free treatment encouraged.

instruction: Instagram la 'Valorant account with rare skins, 2000 only (worth 10,000)' nu post paathen. Buy pannalama?
output: Account selling - game ToS violation, ban risk anyway. Payment pannina - account credentials varaadhu or credentials vandhu password change panniduvaanga. Skins officially game store la vaangunga. Third-party account sales almost always scam.

instruction: Bank account-la kaasu pochu, yaaro OTP vaangi eduthuttaanga (Madurai style)
output: Udane: 1) Bank-kku call - 24/7 helpline, account freeze kelunga, 2) 1930 helpline call, 3) Net banking-la transactions block, 4) ATM card block. 3 days-kkul report pannaa liability kuraiyum. Debit card insurance check pannunga.

instruction: WhatsApp message 'Uzhavar sandhai registration open. 5000 deposit for permanent stall.' Uzhavar sandhai la sell panna chance, genuine aa?
output: Uzhavar Sandhai registration through agriculture department office, not WhatsApp. No large deposits for stall allocation. Visit nearest Uzhavar Sandhai office or agriculture extension officer. Government market stalls have proper application process.

instruction: Thanjavur Oviyam endraal enna?
output: Thanjavur Oviyam - Tamil Nadu-oda traditional painting style. 16th century-la Nayak period-la develop aanadhu. Sirappugal: 1) Gold foil work - relief, 3D effect, 2) Semi-precious stones embedded, 3) Vibrant colors, 4) Hindu gods, goddesses themes, 5) Wooden base with cloth coating. GI (Geographical Indication) tag petradhu. Prices: ₹500 (small) to ₹50,000+ (large). Thanjavur-la niraiya shops. Wedding gift-aaga popular. Museum quality pieces collectors buy panraanga.

instruction: மதுரை சித்திரை திருவிழா எப்படி நடக்கும்?
output: தமிழ்நாட்டின் மிகப்பெரிய திருவிழா. ஒரு மாதம் நடக்கும். முக்கிய events: 1) திருக்கல்யாணம் - மீனாட்சி-சுந்தரேஸ்வரர் திருமணம், 2) ஆழ்வார் திருவீதி புறப்பாடு - Vishnu's brother role, 3) தேர்த்திருவிழா - huge temple car, 4) தெப்பத்திருவிழா - float festival at Mariamman Teppakulam. 1 million+ people வருவார்கள். Hotels, transport early book செய்ய வேண்டும். April/May-ல் வெயில் அதிகம் - prepare accordingly.

instruction: JEE vs TNEA - TN-la Engineering-ku edhu better?
output:
**JEE vs TNEA:**

**TNEA:**
- 12th marks based (No exam!)
- TN colleges only
- Score = Maths×50 + Phy×25 + Chem×25 = 200
- tneaonline.org

**JEE:**
- Exam based
- All India (IIT, NIT, IIIT)
- Tough competition

**Choose TNEA if:**
- Want TN college
- Limited coaching
- Strong in boards

**Choose JEE if:**
- Target IIT/NIT
- Can do coaching
- Want All India options

**Best:** Prepare JEE + Apply both!

instruction: SMS vandhudhu - 'Dear Customer, your SBI account will be blocked. Update KYC immediately: [link]'. Reading glasses illa, pera kitta padikka sonneen, genuine aa?
output: Fake SMS ayya! SBI official SMS la suspicious links anuppaadhu. 'Account blocked' bayamudhuthal tactic. Link click pannina fake website - login details enter pannina account empty aagum. Ignore pannunga. Doubt irundhaa SBI branch ku ponga.

instruction: NEET Tamil Medium-la ezhudhalamaa? Translation problem irukkumaa?
output:
**NEET Tamil Medium:**

**Yes, Tamil-la ezhudhalaam!**

**Paper:** Bilingual - Tamil + English both printed

**Translation Tips:**
1. NCERT Tamil version read
2. English terms-um therinjirukanum (Scientific names, formulas)
3. Both versions study
4. Mock tests Tamil-la practice

**Exam Day:**
- Question confusing? Check English version
- Scientific terms same in both

**Past Issues:**
- Some translation errors reported
- NTA improved now

**Success:** Many Tamil medium students cleared!
7.5% reservation for Govt school students helps.

**Language is NOT a barrier!**

instruction: Bank exam Reasoning section eppadi crack panrathu?
output: Reasoning topics: Puzzles & Seating Arrangement (30-40% weightage), Syllogism, Blood Relations, Direction, Coding-Decoding, Inequality. Strategy: 1) Puzzles - daily 10 practice 2) Logic rules memorize 3) Speed improve through timed practice 4) Easy questions first in exam 5) Skip time-consuming Qs. Resources: RS Aggarwal, Rakesh Yadav, Testbook app. Time: 35 questions in 20-25 minutes. Practice = key to success.

instruction: En pillai career choice-a accept panna mudiyala. Enna seivathu?
output: Generation gap bridge: 1) Listen to their reasons - genuinely try to understand 2) Research that field - income potential, growth, stability 3) Meet professionals in that career - get real picture 4) Trial period suggestion - internship, shadowing 5) Your fears express - but don't impose 6) Compromise explore - related but acceptable field 7) Remember: It's their life to live. Reality: Many non-traditional careers successful today. Trust your upbringing - they'll be fine!

instruction: Amazon வாடிக்கையாளர் சேவை என்று அழைத்து 'உங்கள் ஆர்டர் ரத்து, பணத்திரும்பப் பெற AnyDesk நிறுவுங்கள்' என்றார்கள்.
output: ஆபத்து! AnyDesk நிறுவினால் உங்கள் தொலைபேசியை மோசடிக்காரர் கட்டுப்படுத்த முடியும். Amazon இப்படி செயலிகள் நிறுவச் சொல்வதில்லை. தொலைபேசியை வைக்கவும், Amazon செயலியில் நேரடியாக சரிபார்க்கவும்.

instruction: Video call வருகிறது ஆனால் 'camera problem' என்கிறார், voice மட்டும் கேட்கிறது. நம்பலாமா?
output: Camera problem தொடர்ந்து இருந்தால் suspicious. Voice calls fake செய்வது easy. Video verification இல்லாமல் relationship முன்னேற்றாதீர்கள்.

instruction: Cheque bounce ஆனது - என்ன action எடுக்கலாம்?
output: NI Act 138 procedure: 1) Bank memo receive, 2) Legal notice within 30 days, 3) 15 days wait for payment, 4) Complaint within 30 days (total 45 days from bounce). Court: Magistrate Court. Punishment: 2 years imprisonment + twice cheque amount fine.

instruction: Management quota vs Government quota - என்ன difference?
output: Government quota (65%): Counselling-based merit admission, low fees. Management quota (35%): College direct admission, higher fees (2-5x). NRI quota: Foreign citizen children, highest fees. Reality: Same degree, same placement opportunity. Management quota useful if: Marks low but can afford, specific college wanted, late application. Government quota: Always try first - significant cost savings. Private self-financing colleges: 100% management, higher fees.

instruction: Medicine missed dose - double dose எடுக்கலாமா?
output: Generally NO! Rules vary: 1) Most medicines - take when remembered, skip if close to next dose, 2) Never double dose unless doctor says, 3) Blood pressure/diabetes - specific rules, 4) Antibiotics - complete course important. Dangerous to double: Blood thinners, heart medicines, insulin. Safe practice: 1) Set reminders, 2) Pill boxes, 3) Ask pharmacist/doctor specific instructions. If unsure: Call doctor before taking.

instruction: வாட்ஸ்அப்பில் 'Amazon லக்கி டிரா வென்றீர்கள்' என்று வந்தது. லிங்க் கிளிக் செய்யலாமா?
output: கிளிக் செய்யாதீர்கள்! Amazon இப்படி வாட்ஸ்அப்பில் மெசேஜ் அனுப்பாது. இந்த லிங்க் உங்கள் தகவல்களை திருட உருவாக்கப்பட்டது.

instruction: TB (Tuberculosis) treatment free-yaa kidaikkumaa?
output: Yes! National TB Elimination Program - completely FREE. Services: 1) Diagnosis (sputum test, X-ray), 2) Medicines (6-9 months course), 3) Follow-up tests, 4) DOTS therapy supervision, 5) Nutrition support (Rs.500/month), 6) Transport allowance. Where: Government hospitals, designated TB centres. Private diagnosis: Government will still provide free treatment. Nikshay Poshan Yojana: DBT nutrition support.

instruction: Emergency-ல் hospital admission refuse பண்ணலாமா?
output: NO! Illegal to refuse emergency. Law: Every hospital (government/private) must provide emergency care. Stabilization mandatory before transfer. Cannot ask for: 1) Advance payment, 2) Police clearance (accident), 3) ID proof. MLC cases: Treatment first, formalities later. Violation: Criminal prosecution + license cancellation. Report: 108, police, Health Department.

instruction: PM SVANidhi (Street Vendor Loan) endraal enna?
output: Loan for Street Vendors. First loan: ₹10,000, Second: ₹20,000 (for timely repayment), Third: ₹50,000. Interest Subsidy: 7%. Cashback: Up to ₹1,200/year for digital payments. Eligibility: Certificate of Vending/Letter of Recommendation, Name in Urban Local Body survey. Apply: pmsvanidhi.mohua.gov.in

instruction: என் பையன் engineering வேண்டாம்னு சொல்றான் - என்ன பண்றது?
output: பையனோட interest என்னனு புரிஞ்சுக்கோங்க. Arts, Commerce, Vocational, Creative fields-லயும் நல்ல career opportunities இருக்கு. Aptitude test எடுங்க. Career counsellor-கிட்ட பேசுங்க. Force பண்ணாதீங்க.

instruction: Gopuram, Vimanam irandukum enna viththiyaasam?
output: Gopuram: Koviloda entrance gate tower. Piramaandamaga irukkum. Veliye theriyum. Sirpangal niraiya irukkum. Pirkala kovilkalil gopuram miga uyaram. Vimanam: Karuvrai (sanctum sanctorum) mel ulla tower. Moolavar meedhu neradiyaga irukkum. Aaramba kaala kovilkalil (Chozhar kaalam) vimanam miga uyaram - example: Thanjai Periya Kovil. Pirkaalathil gopuram uyaramanadhu, vimanam siriyathanadhu.

instruction: Aathichudi endraal enna? Sila udhaarangal sollungal?
output: Aathichudi - Avvaiyar ezhuthiya needhi nool. Kuzhanthaigalukkku nallozhukkam karpikka. Ovvoru ezhuthilum thodangum ottrai vari arivuraigal. Famous examples: 1) 'Aram seiya virumbu' - do good deeds, 2) 'Aaruvadhu sinam' - control anger, 3) 'Iyalvadhu karavelv' - don't hide your capabilities, 4) 'Udaiyadhu vilambel' - don't boast, 5) 'Ookkamadhu kaividel' - don't give up enthusiasm. Tamil Nadu schools-la compulsory. Simple but powerful moral lessons!

instruction: Mattra districts-la Siddha hospital irukkaa?
output: Yes! TN Siddha infrastructure: 1) Government Siddha Medical Colleges - Palayamkottai, Tirunelveli (oldest), 2) District AYUSH hospitals - Every district, 3) Taluk level Siddha dispensaries, 4) PHC attached Siddha units. Major colleges: Tirunelveli, Chennai (2), Palani. All services free. Find: tnhealth.tn.gov.in or AYUSH department website. Total: 100+ government Siddha facilities in TN.

instruction: தேரையர் சித்தர் யார்? அவர் specialty என்ன?
output: தேரையர் (Theraiyar) Siddha medicine-ன் founding fathers-ல் ஒருவர். 'நோய் நாடல்' (diagnosis) மற்றும் 'நோய் முதல் நாடல்' (finding root cause)-ல் expert. தேரையர் வைத்திய காண்டம், தேரையர் கருக்கிடை வைத்தியம் போன்ற நூல்கள் எழுதியவர். நோயின் 8 வகை diagnosis methods (என்வகைத் தேர்வு) இவர் formulate செய்ததாக கூறப்படுகிறது.

instruction: திருக்குறளுக்கு வேறு என்ன பெயர்கள் உள்ளன?
output: திருக்குறளுக்கு பல பெயர்கள் உண்டு: 1) முப்பால் - மூன்று பிரிவுகள் இருப்பதால், 2) உத்தரவேதம் - தெற்கின் வேதம், 3) தெய்வநூல் - தெய்வீக நூல், 4) பொதுமறை - எல்லா மதங்களுக்கும் பொதுவான நூல், 5) தமிழ் மறை - தமிழரின் புனித நூல், 6) பொய்யாமொழி - உண்மையான வார்த்தைகள்.

instruction: State board vs CBSE - எது better preparation?
output: Comparison: State Board - Regional language strong, local competitive exams friendly. CBSE - National level exams (JEE, NEET) aligned, English medium uniform. For NEET/JEE: CBSE syllabus closer. For TNPSC: State board better. Reality: Both boards students crack all exams - preparation matters more than board. State board + NCERT combination = best for competitive exams. TN State board now NCERT aligned.

instruction: Cold/cough-க்கு வீட்டு வைத்தியம் என்ன?
output: Effective remedies: 1) Chukku Kaapi - Dry ginger + pepper + palm jaggery boiled in water, 2) Turmeric milk (Manjal Paal) - Before sleep, 3) Steam inhalation with tulsi/eucalyptus, 4) Honey + ginger juice, 5) Pepper rasam, 6) Tulsi kashayam, 7) Gargle with warm salt water. Avoid: Cold water, ice cream, curd. When to see doctor: Fever >3 days, breathing difficulty, blood in phlegm.

instruction: 5 லட்சம் மோசடியில் போனது. அதிகபட்ச மீட்புக்கு என்னென்ன செய்ய வேண்டும்?
output: நாள் 1: அனைத்து நிலையான படிகள் + வழக்கறிஞர் ஆலோசனை, பல வங்கி அழைப்புகள் (உங்களுடையது + பயனாளி), சமூக ஊடக எச்சரிக்கை இடுகை. வாரம் 1: அனைத்து பிரிவுகளுடன் விரிவான FIR ✓, சைபர் செல் வழக்கு ஒதுக்கீடு ✓, சைபர் குற்ற பிரிவுக்கு நேரடி வருகை ✓, செய்தித்தாள் புகார் ✓, வங்கிக்கு RTI ✓. வாரம் 2-4: விசாரணை அதிகாரியுடன் பின்தொடர்தல் ✓, SP சைபர் க்ரைம் விண்ணப்பம் ✓, இணையான குறைதீர்ப்பாளர் புகார் ✓, மற்ற பாதிக்கப்பட்டவர்களைக் கண்டறியவும் ✓, கூட்டு புகார் ✓. மாதம் 2: வங்கிக்கு சட்ட நோட்டீஸ் ✓, நுகர்வோர் மன்றம் தயாரிப்பு ✓, >5L என்றால் ED புகார் ✓, ஊடக அணுகுமுறை ✓. மாதம் 3-6: நுகர்வோர் மன்ற வழக்கு ✓, நீதிமன்ற தேதி வருகை ✓. மீட்பு: தீவிர முயற்சியுடன் 40-60%. காலம்: 6-18 மாதங்கள்.

instruction: Stray dog bite ஆனால் compensation கிடைக்குமா?
output: Corporation/Municipality நிலை பொறுத்தது. Complaint: Corporation + Animal Welfare Board. Compensation: Civil Court suit against local body (negligence). Medical expenses claim. ABC (Animal Birth Control) program failure prove பண்ணணும். Police complaint-உம் possible.

instruction: TN-la vithai/uram subsidy eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Subsidized seeds/fertilizers for farmers. Seed Subsidy: 50% discount on certified seeds, buy at Agriculture dept office. Fertilizer Subsidy: Urea, DAP, MOP at subsidized prices. UZHAVAN Card: Track subsidy, check eligibility. Distribution: Co-operative societies, Agri office. Documents: Patta, Farmer ID, Aadhaar. Season: Announced before sowing season.

instruction: Case status online-la eppadi check panradhu?
output: Websites: ecourts.gov.in (all courts), highcourtmadras.gov.in (Madras HC), sci.gov.in (Supreme Court). Search by: CNR number, party name, case number, advocate name. e-Courts app-um available. Cause list (daily hearing list) check pannalam.

instruction: Ex-servicemen pillaikkalukku padippu salugaigal enna?
output: Benefits: 1) TNPSC-la 2% horizontal reservation 2) Engineering/Medical admission-la reservation 3) Sainik School admission priority 4) AFMC, NDA-la priority 5) Fee concession pala colleges-la. Prime Minister's Scholarship: ₹36,000-60,000/year professional courses-ku. Kendriya Sainik Board scholarship available. Apply with father's discharge certificate.

instruction: இன்ஸ்டாகிராமில் 'giveaway winner நீங்கள்! DM செய்யுங்கள்' என்று comment வந்தது. நம்பலாமா?
output: அந்த account verify செய்யுங்கள். பெரும்பாலும் போலி accounts. DM-ல் பணம் அல்லது தகவல் கேட்டால் block செய்யுங்கள்.

instruction: Sexual harassment complaint eppadi seivathu?
output: Internal Complaints Committee (ICC)-kku written complaint. ICC illaattal Local Complaints Committee (District level). Time limit: 3 months from incident. POSH Act 2013 protection. Anonymous complaint-um valid. Retaliation-kku protection undu.

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY) - TN-la eppadi peruvadhu?
output: PMAY-Urban: Eligibility - EWS (income up to ₹3 lakh), LIG (₹3-6 lakh), MIG-I (₹6-12 lakh), MIG-II (₹12-18 lakh). Benefit: Interest subsidy 3-6.5%. Apply: pmay-urban.gov.in/CSC/Bank. PMAY-Gramin: Houseless as per SECC data. Assistance: ₹1.20 lakh (Plain)/₹1.30 lakh (Hilly). Apply: Gram Panchayat/Block Office. TN: Can also apply through TNHB

instruction: Varadatchanai kekkuraanga, enga poi solrathu? (Madurai style)
output: Recording vachukonga - phone calls, conversations. Messages screenshot edunga. Women helpline 181, or All Women Police Station-la complaint. Dowry Prohibition Act-la case podalam. 5 years jail + fine - kekkuravangalukkum kodukuravangalukkum.

instruction: 10th/12th pass-ku endhendha government jobs apply seiyalaam?
output: 10th pass jobs: 1) Railway Group D 2) SSC MTS (Multi-Tasking Staff) 3) TNPSC Group 4 4) Police constable 5) Post office GDS. 12th pass jobs: 1) SSC CHSL (LDC, DEO) 2) TNPSC Group 4 (higher posts) 3) Bank clerk (some) 4) Railway NTPC 5) Defence - Army, Navy, Air Force. Age: 18-30 (varies). Apply: Respective recruitment websites. Free coaching available through Employment Exchange.

instruction: தேவாரம், திவ்யப்பிரபந்தம் எங்கே கேட்கலாம்/படிக்கலாம்?
output: கேட்க/படிக்க வழிகள்: 1) கோயில்களில் - daily ஓதுவார்கள் பாடுவார்கள், 2) YouTube - Sirkali Govindarajan, DKJ, Bombay Sisters versions famous, 3) Spotify, Gaana apps - playlists உள்ளன, 4) Project Madurai - free text online, 5) Tamil Virtual Academy, 6) Books - Giri Trading, Higginbothams, 7) Apps - Thevaram app, Divya Prabandham app. Morning/evening கேட்டால் peaceful feeling. Margazhi month-ல் திருப்பாவை daily radio-ல் வரும்!

instruction: Manikkavasagar yaar?
output: Manikkavasagar - 'Thiruvasagam' ezhuthiya Saiva punidhiar. Pandiya mannaroda amaichcharaaga irundhavar. Thirupperunduraiyil Sivanai sandhiththu ellavattraiyum vittu bhakthan aanaar. 'Thiruvasagaththukku urugaadhaar oru vaasagaththukkum urugaar' enbadhu famous pazhamozhi. Chidambarathil Sivanidm aikyamaanaar endru nambappadugiradhu. 8-vadhu Thirumurai Thiruvasagam. Unarchi miguntha bhakthi poetry.

instruction: 'யாதானும் நாடாமால் ஊராமால்' - இந்த புகழ்பெற்ற குறள் என்ன சொல்கிறது?
output: குறள்: 'யாதானும் நாடாமால் ஊராமால் என்னொருவன் சாந்துணையும் கல்லாத வாறு'. அர்த்தம்: எந்த நாடும் எந்த ஊரும் கல்வி கற்றவனுக்கு சொந்தம். அவன் எங்கு சென்றாலும் மதிப்பு பெறுவான். ஆனால் கல்வி இல்லாதவன் சாகும் வரை ஒன்றும் இல்லாதவனாகவே இருப்பான். கல்வியின் அவசியத்தை வலியுறுத்தும் குறள்.

instruction: Exam-la time management eppadi seivathu?
output: Strategies: 1) Question paper muzhuvathum mudhalil padiyunga (5 mins) 2) Easy questions mudhalil attempt 3) Marks-ku erpa time allocate (1 mark = 1 minute rule) 4) Stuck aanaal skip, later return 5) Last 10 minutes revision-ku keep 6) Answer length = marks (2 marks = half page, 5 marks = 1 page) 7) Watch/clock parunga regularly. Practice: At home, exam conditions-la previous papers ezhuthunga.

instruction: Medical records copy கேட்கலாமா? Hospital தர மறுக்கலாமா?
output: Patient's absolute right! Records include: 1) Discharge summary, 2) Investigation reports, 3) Operation notes, 4) Prescription copies, 5) Bills. Hospital must provide within 72 hours of request. Cannot refuse. Charges: Nominal photocopying charges only. Digital records: Soft copy also must provide. Retention: Hospital must keep records 3 years minimum. Missing records: Hospital liable.

instruction: Nandri marappadu patri enna solkiraar?
output: Kural: 'Endhandri kondraarkum uyvundaam uyvilai seinandri kondra magarku'. Ella baavangalukkum mannippu undu, aanaal nandri marandhavnukku illai. Melum: 'Nandri marappadu nandrandru nandralla thandriyum marappadu nandru'. Nandriyai marakkakkoodaadhu, theemayai marakkalaam. Forgetting kindness = unforgivable sin!

instruction: ரேஷன் கார்டில் பெயர் சேர்க்க என்ன செய்ய வேண்டும்?
output: புதிதாக பிறந்த குழந்தை அல்லது திருமணம் ஆன பெண் என்றால் Form 2 நிரப்ப வேண்டும். Birth certificate அல்லது marriage certificate, Aadhaar copy கொடுக்க வேண்டும். Online-லும் apply செய்யலாம்.

instruction: Porumai (patience) patri mukkiya kuralgal enna?
output: Kural: 'Agazhvaarai thaangum nilampoola thammai igazhvaarp poruththal thalai'. Thannai igazhpavargalaiyum bhoomi pol thaanguvadhae sirandha gunam. Melum: 'Poruththaaraip pondraami kaakkum'. Porumai ullavargalai failure kaakkum. Patience = shield against failure!

instruction: Friend சொன்னான்: 'இந்த app-ல் invest செய்தால் daily 5% interest கிடைக்கும்' - genuine-ஆ?
output: Daily 5% என்றால் வருடத்திற்கு 1800%! இது சாத்தியமில்லை. Ponzi scheme. ஆரம்பத்தில் பணம் தருவார்கள், பின்பு app மூடிவிடும்.

instruction: Case ethanai years oodum? Settlement pannalaamaa?
output: Timeline: Consumer Forum 1-3 years, Civil court 5-10 years, Criminal 3-7 years. Settlement: 1) Lok Adalat (mutually agreed), 2) Mediation (court-annexed), 3) Direct negotiation. Benefits: Faster resolution, certain outcome, lower legal costs. Caution: Don't settle too low - get legal opinion on fair amount. Hospital insurance: Usually pushes for settlement.

instruction: MA/M.Sc/M.Com படிப்பு அரசு கல்லூரிகளில் எப்படி சேருவது?
output: சேர்க்கை முறை: 1) TNGASA PG Admissions portal 2) UG மதிப்பெண் அடிப்படையில் rank 3) ஆன்லைன் counselling. தகுதி: சம்பந்தப்பட்ட UG படிப்பு 50% marks. கட்டணம்: அரசு கல்லூரிகளில் ₹2,000-5,000/ஆண்டு மட்டுமே. படிப்பு காலம்: 2 ஆண்டுகள். NET/SET தேர்வுக்கு தயாராகலாம்.

instruction: Free vaccination schedule என்ன? எங்கே போகணும்?
output: Universal Immunization Program - FREE for all children. Schedule: Birth - BCG, OPV, Hep B; 6 weeks - DPT, OPV, Hep B; 10 weeks - DPT, OPV; 14 weeks - DPT, OPV, Hep B; 9 months - Measles, Vitamin A; 16-24 months - DPT booster, OPV, Measles. Where: PHC, Government hospital, Anganwadi. Carry: Child's health card. Missed dose: Can catch up - consult ANM.

instruction: Traffic police wrongly fine போட்டால் என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) On-spot - evidence காட்டி argue (dashcam, photos), 2) Court-ல் contest (challan dispute), 3) Online grievance: tnpolice.gov.in, 4) RTO officer complaint. Challan copy கேளுங்க. Court contest-க்கு time limit உண்டு.

instruction: Stroke symptoms enna? FAST endraal enna?
output: FAST test: F - Face drooping (one side), A - Arm weakness (can't raise one arm), S - Speech difficulty (slurred), T - Time to call emergency. Other symptoms: Sudden confusion, vision problem, severe headache, walking difficulty. Action: 1) Call 108, 2) Note time symptoms started (important for treatment), 3) Don't give food/water (swallowing problem possible). Window: 3-4.5 hours for clot-busting treatment.

instruction: Eviction notice வந்தால் எத்தனை நாள் time கிடைக்கும்?
output: Agreement-ல் mention செய்த notice period (1-3 மாதம்) கிடைக்கும். Court through eviction என்றால் reasonable time கொடுப்பார்கள். Rent default case-ல் 15 நாள் notice கொடுத்து arrears pay செய்ய chance தருவார்கள்.

instruction: Association maintenance fee yaar kattanum?
output: Podhuvaaga tenant kattuvathu practice. But agreement-la enna solliyirukko adhuthaan valid. Corpus fund, sinking fund pola one-time payments owner responsibility. Monthly maintenance tenant kattuvathu common.

instruction: LinkedIn la 'HR from Google/Microsoft' message - 'Your profile selected, initial interview fee 5,000 for assessment platform access.' Dream job opportunity, pay pannalama?
output: Google, Microsoft - NO interview fees. 'HR' direct message - fake recruiter. Assessment platforms company provide pannum free. LinkedIn fake recruiters mass aa irukkaanga. Official career pages la apply pannunga, DM job offers ignore pannunga.

instruction: Snake bite aanaal enna seyyanum? Enna koodaadhu?
output: DO: 1) Stay calm, 2) Immobilize bitten limb (don't move), 3) Remove jewelry (swelling), 4) Call 108/go to hospital immediately, 5) Note snake appearance if possible. DON'T: 1) Cut/suck wound, 2) Apply tourniquet tightly, 3) Apply ice/electric shock, 4) Give alcohol/traditional remedies, 5) Waste time catching snake. Antivenom: Available free at government hospitals. All snake bites need hospital evaluation.

instruction: Marriage-க்கு minimum age என்ன?
output: பெண் - 18 years, ஆண் - 21 years. Underage marriage illegal (Child Marriage Restraint Act). Underage marriage voidable (annul செய்யலாம்). Parents/guardians-க்கு 2 years imprisonment + Rs.1 lakh fine. Marriage fix பண்றவர்களும் liable.

instruction: பொறுமையின் பலன் என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'உண்ணாது நோற்பார் பெரியர் பிறர்சொல்லும் இன்னாச்சொல் நோற்பாரின் பின்'. கடுஞ்சொற்களை பொறுப்பவர்கள் விரதம் இருப்பவர்களை விட பெரியவர்கள். மேலும்: 'ஒறுத்தாரை ஒன்றாக வையாரே வைப்பர் பொறுத்தாரைப் பொன்றாக வைப்பர்'. Revenge எடுப்பவரை மக்கள் மதிக்க மாட்டார்கள், பொறுப்பவரை மதிப்பார்கள். Patience earns respect!

instruction: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY) endraal enna?
output: Free Skill Training. Duration: 150-300 hours. Courses: IT, Healthcare, Construction, Retail, etc. Benefits: Free Training, Certificate (Industry recognized), Placement assistance, Up to ₹8,000 reward (if assessment passed). Join: pmkvyofficial.org → Find Training Center, Nearby PMKVY Training Center, Need Aadhaar, Photo. RPL: Certificate for those with existing skills, ₹500 assessment fee (refundable)

instruction: Sore throat-kku gargle options?
output: Gargle remedies: 1) Salt + warm water (most common), 2) Turmeric + salt + warm water, 3) Honey + warm water, 4) Apple cider vinegar diluted, 5) Licorice (Athimathuram) decoction. Frequency: 3-4 times daily. Drinks: 1) Warm water throughout day, 2) Honey + lemon + warm water, 3) Tulsi tea. Avoid: Cold drinks, spicy food, shouting. Persistent: If >1 week, see ENT doctor.

instruction: Minor குழந்தைக்கு PAN Card தேவையா?
output: தேவைப்படும் சூழ்நிலைகள்: குழந்தை பெயரில் Fixed Deposit/Investment, குழந்தைக்கு வருமானம் இருந்தால் (Child Artist), Property குழந்தை பெயரில் இருந்தால். விண்ணப்பிக்க: பெற்றோர்/Guardian விண்ணப்பிக்க வேண்டும், குழந்தையின் Birth Certificate + Parent's ID proof தேவை, 18 வயதானதும் details update செய்ய வேண்டும் (photo, signature)

instruction: அழைப்பு வந்தது 'மின்சார வாரியத்திலிருந்து பேசுகிறேன். உங்கள் மின்சார இணைப்பு இன்று துண்டிக்கப்படும். தவிர்க்க இப்போதே 2000 செலுத்துங்கள்.' என்ன செய்வது?
output: இது மோசடி அழைப்பு. மின்சார வாரியம் தொலைபேசியில் பணம் கேட்பதில்லை, நோட்டீஸ் அனுப்பும். எந்த பணமும் செலுத்தாதீர்கள். அருகிலுள்ள EB அலுவலகத்தில் நேரடியாக சரிபார்க்கவும்.

instruction: New Year eve - 'Party pass 50% off! Limited slots, pay now!' Instagram DM வந்துச்சு. Book பண்ணலாமா?
output: Risky! New Year party scams common. Unknown organizers money வாங்கி event cancel பண்ணிடுவாங்க. Verified event organizers மட்டும் trust பண்ணுங்க. DM offer-ஐ avoid பண்ணுங்க. Reviews check பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Call vandhudhu 'RERA registration update mandatory. Pay 20,000 processing fee immediately.' RERA registered broker, update pannanum aa?
output: RERA agent registration through state RERA portal (rera.tn.gov.in for TN). Renewal fees are fixed and much lower. Updates done online, no phone-based processing. Check your registration status directly on RERA portal. Scammers target real estate professionals.

instruction: Medicine MRP-க்கு மேல் விற்றால் complaint எங்கே?
output: Complaint: Drug Inspector (District), State Drug Control. Legal Metrology Department-உம் complaint எடுக்கும். Pharmacy license suspend/cancel ஆகலாம். Consumer forum-ல் compensation. Evidence: Bill with MRP comparison. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

instruction: Bank loan EMI கட்ட முடியல, என்ன ஆகும்?
output: EMI default ஆனால்: 1) 90 days delay = NPA (Non-Performing Asset), 2) Bank notice அனுப்பும், 3) Recovery agent வரலாம் - ஆனால் அவங்க threaten பண்ண கூடாது, 4) Restructure/one-time settlement கேளுங்க, 5) Home loan: SARFAESI Act-ன் கீழ் property auction ஆகலாம். RBI guidelines: Recovery agent harassment-க்கு complaint போடலாம்.

instruction: Voter ID card-ல் address மாற்ற என்ன செய்வது?
output: voters.eci.gov.in-ல் Form 8A நிரப்பி online submit செய்யலாம். புதிய address proof upload செய்யுங்கள். BLO verification நடக்கும். 15-30 நாட்களில் updated card வரும்.

instruction: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thittam enna?
output: ₹1,000/month for woman head of family in TN. Eligibility: 21+ age, family income below ₹2.5 lakh, not govt employee/tax payer, no other pension. Apply through Anganwadi or kalaaboravu.tn.gov.in with Aadhaar, ration card, bank account.

instruction: En paiyan/ponnu college-la veliyoor poraanga. Eppadi support panrathu?
output: Parent support tips: 1) Regular communication - but not controlling 2) Visit once in first month - help settle 3) Emergency contact with warden establish 4) Bank account with adequate funds 5) UPI/GPay teach for daily expenses 6) Health insurance ensure 7) Trust them - allow independence 8) Listen without judging when they share problems 9) Homesickness normal - patience. Balance: Support without helicopter parenting. They're growing up!

instruction: Gym/Coaching centre refund தர மறுக்கிறார்கள் - சட்டப்படி கேட்கலாமா?
output: Service not availed-க்கு pro-rata refund கேட்கலாம். 'No refund' policy unfair trade practice ஆகலாம். Lock-in period reasonable-ஆ இருக்கணும். Consumer forum-ல் complaint போடலாம். Covid போன்ற force majeure cases-ல் full refund கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Dementia patient-kku legal protection enna?
output: Protections: 1) Guardianship: Court can appoint guardian for person/property, 2) Power of Attorney: Execute while still competent, 3) Senior Citizens Act: Protection from exploitation, 4) RPD Act: Disability rights. Financial: 1) Joint account with trusted person, 2) Nomination in all accounts, 3) Will execution early. Healthcare: Advance directive possible. Abuse: Report to police, Senior Citizens Tribunal.

instruction: Visitation rights endraal enna?
output: Custody illadha parent-kku child-ai sandhikkum right. Court order: Weekly/monthly visits, holiday stays, phone/video calls. Visitation deny panninaal contempt of court. Both parents cooperate seivathu child-kku nalladhu.

instruction: Marriage-la mental illness ground for divorce-aa?
output: Complex issue. Law: Mental disorder is a ground under Hindu Marriage Act, but: 1) Must be incurable/very severe, 2) Must be before marriage or continuous after, 3) Court considers treatment possibility, 4) Living together impossible. Safeguards: 1) Medical evidence needed, 2) Treatment efforts considered, 3) Maintenance rights protected. Progressive interpretation: Courts increasingly protective of mentally ill spouse.

instruction: Maatruththiraanaali (differently abled) students-ku padippu salugaigal enna?
output: Benefits: 1) 5% reservation in all courses 2) Full fee waiver in govt colleges 3) Free laptop scheme 4) Special scholarship ₹3,000-10,000/month 5) Scribe facility in exams 6) Extra time (20 minutes/hour). UDID card theva. Disability certificate 40%+ irukka venum. Apply through Differently Abled Welfare Department.

instruction: Doctor எங்க native language-ல் explain பண்ணணுமா?
output: Yes! Right to information in understandable language. Includes: 1) Diagnosis explanation, 2) Treatment options, 3) Risks and benefits, 4) Consent form explanation, 5) Medicine instructions. If doctor doesn't speak Tamil: Hospital should arrange translator. Written materials: Should be in local language. Complaint: If communication barrier causes harm - negligence claim possible.

instruction: Cashless hospitalization எப்படி வேலை செய்யும்?
output: Process: 1) Check hospital in network list, 2) Inform TPA/insurer before admission (planned), 3) Show health card at admission, 4) Hospital sends pre-auth request, 5) TPA approves amount, 6) Treatment happens, 7) Final bill - approved amount deducted, balance you pay. Emergency: Inform within 24 hours. Rejected: Appeal to insurer, pay and claim reimbursement.

instruction: MBBS/BDS admission-ku Tamil Nadu-la enna seiya venum?
output: NEET exam compulsory. Steps: 1) NEET ezhuthunga 2) TN Medical Selection Committee counselling-ku apply pannunga 3) Online choice filling 4) Govt/Private medical college allotment. Govt college fee: Yearly ₹13,500. 7.5% govt school students-ku separate reservation.

instruction: Vallalar (Ramalinga Adigal) yaar?
output: Vallalar (1823-1874) - 'Arutperunjothi' thaththuvathai parappiyavar. Jaadhi, madha verupaadugalai ethirthavar. 'Samarasa Suttha Sanmaarga Sangam' niruvinar. Vadaloor Sathya Gnana Sabhai kattinar - kovil without idol, pure light worship. 'Jeevakarunyam' (compassion for all living beings) mukkiya bodhanai. 1874-la 'Degathai oliyaaga maatri maraindhaar' endru nambappadugiradhu. Annadhaanam thodangiyavar - free food for all.

instruction: Board exam-ku eppadi thirambaada padippathu?
output: Tips: 1) Previous year question papers practice pannunga 2) Time table pottu padiyunga 3) Blue print padi important chapters-ku priority 4) Daily 6-8 hours study 5) Weekly revision 6) Health-a kavaniyunga - proper sleep, food 7) Group study avoid, self-study better. TN government question bank: www.dge.tn.gov.in. Sample papers free download.

instruction: Marriage registration eppadi seyvadhu?
output: Hindu Marriage Act paadi: 1. Sub-registrar office-la application 2. Documents: Both age proof (Male 21+, Female 18+), Address proof, photos, Marriage invitation / photos, 2 witnesses (Aadhaar copy) 3. Fee: ₹100-500 4. Online: tnreginet.gov.in

instruction: RTI reply எத்தனை நாளில் கிடைக்கும்?
output: Normal: 30 days. Life/liberty matter: 48 hours. Third party information: 40 days. Transfer to other department: 35 days (5 days transfer + 30 days). Reply இல்லாவிட்டால் deemed refusal - First Appeal போடலாம்.

instruction: 'அறிவுடையார் ஆவது அறிவார்' - leadership பற்றி வள்ளுவர் என்ன சொல்கிறார்?
output: குறள்: 'அறிவுடையார் ஆவது அறிவார் அறிவிலார் அஃதறி கல்லா தவர்'. அர்த்தம்: அறிவுடையவர்கள் வரப்போவதை முன்கூட்டியே அறிவார்கள். அறிவில்லாதவர்கள் அப்படி அறிய மாட்டார்கள். எதிர்காலத்தைப் பார்க்கும் திறன் (foresight) பற்றிய குறள். நல்ல leader-க்கு இது அவசியம்.

instruction: Wrong product deliver aanadhu - return policy illaiyaam, enna seivathu?
output: Wrong product deliver aanaal return policy illa endru solla mudiyaadhu - idhu seller mistake. Consumer Protection Act-in keezh correct product or full refund ketkalam. Screenshots, photos eduthu complaint podunga. NCH, consumer forum - irandilum case podalam.

instruction: Traffic police thappaa fine pottuttaaru, ethirkkalaama? (Tirunelveli style)
output: Aamaa ethirkkalam. Dashcam/CCTV proof irundhaa best. Court-la challan contest pannalam. Online grievance: tnpolice.gov.in. Time limit undu - delay aagaama ponga. Challan copy kattaayam vaangunga.

instruction: 'Azhukkaaru avaa veguli' - theeya gunangal patriya kural enna?
output: Kural: 'Azhukkaaru avaaveguli innaachol naangum izhukkaarau iyandradhu il'. Artham: 1) Azhukkaaru (jealousy), 2) Avaa (greed), 3) Veguli (anger), 4) Innaachol (harsh words) - indha naangum illadhavan ozhukkamaanavan. Four enemies of good character!

instruction: Birth certificate eppadi peruvadhu?
output: Register within 21 days at hospital location's Municipality/Panchayat - FREE! After 21 days: ₹50 late fee + affidavit. Documents: Hospital discharge summary, parents' Aadhaar. Online at tnreginet.gov.in or crsorgi.gov.in. Certificate in 3-5 days.

instruction: Tamil medium-la padichaa future-la problem varumaa? English medium better-aa?
output: Reality check: Tamil medium = Mother tongue strong, concepts clear. English medium = Language advantage. Both work! Important: 1) Foundation subjects (Maths, Science) any medium OK 2) English can be learned later 3) Many Tamil medium toppers in competitive exams 4) Government jobs no medium preference. Advice: Choose based on child comfort. Tamil medium + English tuition = balanced approach. Focus on learning, not medium.

instruction: Medicine expiry ஆனா use பண்ணலாமா?
output: NO! Expired medicine risks: 1) May not work (lost potency), 2) May become toxic, 3) Can cause adverse reactions. Law: Selling expired medicine = criminal offence. Check: Expiry date on strip/bottle before purchase. If sold expired: 1) Return to pharmacy, 2) Drug Inspector complaint, 3) Consumer Forum. Storage: Keep as per instructions - some need refrigeration.

instruction: Aadhaar paadhukaappaaga vaikka enna seyyalam?
output: 1) Lock biometrics at myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in - prevents unauthorized authentication. 2) Use Virtual ID (VID) - 16-digit temporary number instead of Aadhaar. 3) Use Masked Aadhaar - shows only last 4 digits. 4) Check authentication history regularly.

instruction: 'Start your e-commerce business, we handle everything - products, delivery, marketing. Investment 1 lakh, returns 50,000/month.'
output: Legitimate dropshipping requires YOUR effort - product selection, marketing, customer service. 'We handle everything + guaranteed returns' = Ponzi. 1 lakh vaangitu fake dashboard kaatuppaanga with 'profits' - withdrawal impossible. Real business = real work, no guarantees.

instruction: SC/ST students-ku ennenna scholarships kidaikkum?
output: Adi Dravidar Welfare Department: 1) Pre-matric scholarship - ₹500-1,500/year 2) Post-matric scholarship - ₹3,000-10,000/year 3) Professional course - full fee + maintenance 4) PhD scholarship 5) Foreign study - ₹20 lakh 6) Free laptop 7) Hostel free 8) Books, uniform free. Apply: www.adwelfare.tn.gov.in. Income limit: ₹2.5 lakh/year. Almost all courses-ku scholarship irukku.

instruction: Consumer forum order implement ஆகல - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Execution petition file பண்ணுங்க. Order implement செய்யாத party-க்கு: 1) Fine, 2) Imprisonment (up to 3 years), 3) Property attachment. Forum-க்கே execution petition போடுங்க. District Collector மூலமும் execution நடக்கும்.

instruction: Tuition poganuuma? School padippu mattum podhaadha?
output: Depends on: 1) School quality - Government/Private 2) Child's self-study ability 3) Parent support at home 4) Specific subject weakness. Tuition alternatives: 1) Free government coaching centres 2) YouTube educational videos 3) Khan Academy, BYJU'S free tier 4) Group study with friends 5) Senior students help. When needed: Maths, Science weak subjects, competitive exam preparation. Cost: ₹500-2000/month for tuition. Self-study skill develop = best investment.

instruction: Pregnant lady-க்கு call - 'Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana-ல் extra benefit, registration-க்கு Aadhaar OTP கொடுங்கள்'.
output: PMMVY registration-க்கு OTP தேவையில்லை. Anganwadi center அல்லது hospital-ல் direct apply செய்யலாம். Pregnant women-ஐ target செய்யும் scam. OTP கொடுக்காதீர்கள்.

instruction: Govt school-la ennenna free-ya kidaikkum?
output:
**Govt School Free Benefits:**

1. **Education:** Fully free
2. **Books:** All textbooks free
3. **Uniform:** 2 sets/year + Shoes, Socks
4. **Mid-Day Meal:** Breakfast + Lunch + Weekly egg, milk, banana
5. **Bus Pass:** Free travel
6. **Stationery:** Notebook, Pen, Pencil, Geometry box
7. **School Bag:** Some schools
8. **Footwear:** Canvas shoes
9. **Health Checkup:** 2 times/year + Free spectacles
10. **Scholarship:** Additional for SC/ST/BC/MBC

instruction: 'Ayya, hospital la irundhu pesuren, unga son accident la admit, immediate surgery ku 1 lakh vendum, UPI pannunga' nu call vandhudhu. Bayama irukku, enna pannanum?
output: Ayya, FIRST unga son ku phone pannunga! Answer pannala na, daughter-in-law, office ku call pannunga. Real hospital random numbers la UPI kekkaadhu - admission formalities irukkum. Panic la verify pannama pay pannaadheenga. 30 seconds verification lakhs save pannum.

instruction: Management quota vs Government quota - enna difference?
output: Government quota (65%): Counselling-based merit admission, low fees. Management quota (35%): College direct admission, higher fees (2-5x). NRI quota: Foreign citizen children, highest fees. Reality: Same degree, same placement opportunity. Management quota useful if: Marks low but can afford, specific college wanted, late application. Government quota: Always try first - significant cost savings. Private self-financing colleges: 100% management, higher fees.

instruction: Karunai illadhavargal patri enna solkiraar?
output: Kural: 'Arulillaarkku avvulagam illai porulillaarkku ivvulagam illai'. Karunai illadhavargalukkku marumai illai, panam illadhavargalukkku immai kashtam. Melum: 'Porulartraar pooppar orukaal arulartraar artrraarmatr raadhal aridhu'. Panam ponaal thirumba varum, karunai ponaal thirumba varaadhu. Kindness once lost = hardest to regain!

instruction: முதியோர் ஓய்வூதியம் எப்படி பெறுவது?
output: TN State: ₹1,000/month (60-79 years), ₹1,500/month (80+). Eligibility: BPL/low income, no other pension. Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office with age proof, income certificate, Aadhaar, bank account. VAO verification. Time: 30-60 days.

instruction: Doctor credentials எப்படி verify பண்றது?
output: Verify: 1) NMC website (nmc.org.in) - Indian Medical Register, 2) State Medical Council register, 3) Specialist registration (for specialists), 4) Hospital website - doctor profile. Check: 1) MBBS registration number, 2) PG degree registration, 3) Disciplinary actions if any. Fake doctor: Report to police + Medical Council. Important: Any doctor must display registration number.

instruction: Agathiyar ezhuthiya noolgal enna?
output: Agathiyar peyaril ulla noolgal: 1) Agathiyar Gnaanam - aanmeega gnaanam, 2) Agathiyar Vaiththiyam - maruththuvam, 3) Agathiyar Karma Kaandam - astrology, 4) Agathiyar Yogam - yoga practices, 5) Agathiyar Naadi - palm leaf predictions, 6) Agathiyar Rathna Soothiram - gemology. 'Agathiyar 12000' endra periya noolum ulladhu. Moththam 200-kkum merppatta noolgal avar peyaril ullana.

instruction: 'கற்றதனால் ஆய பயனென்கொல்' - இந்த குறளின் பொருள் என்ன?
output: குறள்: 'கற்றதனால் ஆய பயனென்கொல் வாலறிவன் நற்றாள் தொழாஅர் எனின்'. அர்த்தம்: தூய அறிவுடைய இறைவனின் திருவடிகளை வணங்காவிட்டால், கற்ற கல்வியால் என்ன பயன்? கல்வியின் உண்மையான பயன் இறைவனை வணங்குவதே என்கிறார் வள்ளுவர்.

instruction: மீனவர் குடும்ப மாணவர்களுக்கு scholarship உள்ளதா?
output: ஆம், Fisheries Department Scholarships: 1) Pre-matric - ₹500-1,500/ஆண்டு 2) Post-matric - ₹2,000-5,000/ஆண்டு 3) Professional courses - ₹10,000-30,000 4) Higher education abroad - ₹10 lakh. தகுதி: Fishermen community certificate, registered fisherman's child. Apply: www.fisheries.tn.gov.in. Special quota in Anna University marine courses.

instruction: Owner advance-la painting charge, cleaning charge kazhikkuraar - sariyaa?
output: Normal wear and tear-kku tenant responsible illa. Paint fading, minor scratches idhukku kazhikka mudiyaadhu. But tenant potta holes, major damage-kku kazhikkalam. Move-in bodhu photos eduthu vaichirupathu nalladhu.

instruction: Ration card complaint எங்கே கொடுப்பது?
output: Options: 1) Ration shop-ல் complaint book, 2) Taluk Supply Officer, 3) District Supply Officer, 4) Food helpline: 1967, 5) TNCSC website. Issues: Fake entries, quantity shortage, quality issues, dealer misbehavior. Aadhaar seeding problems: UIDAI + DSO.

instruction: PM-KUSUM scheme endraal enna? Solar pump eppadi vaanguvadhu?
output: Solar Energy scheme for farmers. Component A: Install solar power plants (500kW-2MW), sell electricity to grid. Component B: Standalone solar pumps (up to 7.5 HP), 60% subsidy (Central 30% + State 30%), farmer pays only 40%. Component C: Convert existing pump to solar. Apply: mnre.gov.in or State DISCOM. Benefit: Free electricity, reduced carbon footprint.

instruction: Defence Jobs-ku ennenna exams irukku? Age limit enna?
output:
**Defence Exams:**

**1. NDA:** 12th pass, 16.5-19.5 age, UPSC exam, Males only

**2. CDS:** Degree, 19-25 age, UPSC exam

**3. AFCAT:** Degree 60%, 20-26 age, Air Force

**4. Army:**
- Soldier GD: 10th, 17.5-21 age
- Soldier Clerk: 12th, 17.5-23 age
- Technical: Engineering degree

**5. Navy:** SSC Officer, Sailor entries

**6. Coast Guard:** Navik, Yantrik - 10th/12th

**Physical Standards:**
- Height 157-170 cm
- Vision 6/6 or correctable
- No flat feet

**Preparation:** Written + SSB Interview + Medical + Physical

**Websites:** joinindianarmy.nic.in, joinindiannavy.gov.in

instruction: Government hospital-ல் waiting time அதிகமா இருக்கு, tips?
